TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellman extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDiffieHellman Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 提供 Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法實作可從中衍生的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm implementations can derive from.

summary.span: 這個類別提供一組所有 ECDH 實作都必須支援的基本作業。

span.span: This class provides the basic set of operations that all ECDH implementations must support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可做為 ECDH 實作抽象基底類別。This class serves as the abstract base class for ECDH implementations.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ECDiffieHellman ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ECDiffieHellman();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自的類別會呼叫這個建構函式類別。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 類別是目前包含在唯一實作[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The class is the only implementation that is currently included in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需如何建立新的實作 Elliptic Curve Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 演算法的資訊，請參閱方法。For information about how to create a new implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm, see the method.

summary.span: 建立 Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

summary.span: 建立 Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

returns.span: 這個類別預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of this class.

param.span: 用來產生新公用/私密金鑰組的曲線。

span.span: The curve to use to generate a new public/private key-pair.

summary.span: 使用在指定曲線上產生的新公開/私密金鑰組，來建立橢圓曲線 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法之預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with a new public/private key-pair generated over the specified curve.

returns.span: 橢圓曲線 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法之預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曲線必須驗證 (也就是它必須傳回 true 時傳遞至方法。curve must validate (that is, it must return true when passed to the method. 在 Windows 上不支援特性 2 曲線。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman Create (System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters parameters);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman Create(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters parameters) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (parameters As ECParameters) As ECDiffieHellman

param.name: parameters
param.span: 適用於橢圓曲線密碼編譯 (ECC) 演算法的參數。

span.span: The parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.

summary.span: 使用指定 物件所指定的金鑰，來建立橢圓曲線 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法之預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with the key described by the specified object.

returns.span: 橢圓曲線 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法之預設實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `parameters` 必須驗證 (也就是它必須傳回`true`) 時傳遞至方法。`parameters` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method. 不支援透過隱含曲線的參數。Parameters over implicit curves are not supported. 在 Windows 上不支援特性 2 曲線。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

Public Shared Function Create (algorithm As String) As ECDiffieHellman
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::ECDiffieHellman ^ Create(System::String ^ algorithm);

param.name: algorithm
param.span: ECDH 演算法的實作名稱。

span.span: The name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm.

summary.span: 建立橢圓曲線 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 演算法的指定實作新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

returns.span: 此類別之指定實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class.

returns.span: 如果指定的演算法名稱未對應到 ECDH 實作，這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDH implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要開發自己的實作物件，您可以使用方法多載來建立自訂`algorithm`字串，指定您的實作。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. `algorithm`參數會指定名稱的 ECDH 演算法的實作。The `algorithm` parameter specifies the name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm. 下列字串全部參考相同的實作，也就是 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中目前支援的唯一實作。The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]: - "ECDH""ECDH" - 「 ECDiffieHellman""ECDiffieHellman" - 「 ECDiffieHellmanCng""ECDiffieHellmanCng" - "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng""System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" 您也可以提供名稱的自訂 ECDH 實作`algorithm`參數。You can also provide the name of a custom ECDH implementation for the `algorithm` parameter. 如果您這樣做，請物件將會使用它來判斷是否可以建立 ECDH 物件。If you do that, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDH object can be created.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 使用雜湊函式衍生可用來做為金鑰的位元組。

span.span: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a hash function .

summary.span: 指定另一方的公開金鑰和雜湊演算法的名稱，使用雜湊函式衍生可用來做為金鑰的位元組。

span.span: The key material from the key exchange with the other party’s public key.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，使用傳輸層安全性 (TLS) 似隨機函式 (PRF) 衍生演算法，衍生可用來做為金鑰的位元組。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, derives bytes that can be used as a key using a Transport Layer Security (TLS) Pseudo-Random Function (PRF) derivation algorithm.

returns.span: 金鑰的金鑰內容會與另一方的公開金鑰交換。

span.span: The key material from the key exchange with the other party’s public key.

span.span: A derived class must override this method.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會使用明確的曲線形式，將公開或公開和私密金鑰資訊從運作中的 金鑰匯出至 結構，讓您可將它傳遞至 方法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, exports either the public or the public and private key information using the explicit curve form from a working key to an structure so that it can be passed to the method.

span.span: An object that represents the point on the curve for this key, using the explicit curve format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必須驗證 (也就是它必須傳回`true`) 時傳遞至方法)，且不得為隱含。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method) and must not be implicit. 在 Windows 上不支援特性 2 曲線。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

value.span: 金鑰交換演算法的名稱。

span.span: The name of the key exchange algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值 （非覆寫） 實作會傳回字串"ECDiffieHellman"。The default (non-overridden) implementation of this property returns the string "ECDiffieHellman". 這個屬性繼承自基底類別。This property is inherited from the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey PublicKey { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey PublicKey
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PublicKey As ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey
public: abstract property System::Security::Cryptography::ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey ^ PublicKey { System::Security::Cryptography::ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的 Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 執行個體正在使用的公開金鑰。

span.span: Gets the public key that is being used by the current Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) instance.

value.span: 這個 執行個體正在使用的 ECDH 金鑰組的公開部分。

span.span: The public part of the ECDH key pair that is being used by this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SignatureAlgorithm { get; }
.property instance string SignatureAlgorithm
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SignatureAlgorithm As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SignatureAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得簽章演算法的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the signature algorithm.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性繼承自基底類別。This property is inherited from the base class. Elliptic Curve Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 演算法的金鑰衍生，用於產生沒有數位簽章。The Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm is used for key derivation, not digital signature generation. 因此，這個屬性會傳回`null`。Therefore, this property returns `null`.

public: override System::String ^ ToXmlString(bool includePrivateParameters);
